mapper.select: SELECT CR.CLAIM_NO, C.RECEIPT_DATE, CR.AMOUNT, C.STATUS FROM CLAIM_RESULT CR JOIN CLAIM C ON CR.CLAIM_NO = C.CLAIM_NO WHERE C.STATUS = '완료' AND C.ID = #{ID}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM CLAIM /* QueryID : com.demo.proworks.claim.deleteClaim */ WHERE CLAIM_NO = #{claim_no}
mapper.select: SELECT /* QueryID : com.demo.proworks.claim.selectClaim */ CLAIM_NO, CLAIM_TYPE, RECEIPT_DATE, STATUS, EMP_NO, ID, CLAIM_CONTENT, DISEASE_CODE, DATE_OF_ACCIDENT FROM CLAIM WHERE CLAIM_NO = #{claim_no}
